statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT address, city FROM customers WHERE zip_code='12345' ORDER BY city;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city='New York' AND state='NY';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, city, state, zip_code, phone_number FROM customers WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, city, state, zip_code, phone_number FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY zip_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE zip_code LIKE '90%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, city DESC;
SELECT customer_name, CONCAT(address, ', ', city, ', ', state, ' ', zip_code) AS full_address FROM customers WHERE state = 'TX' AND city = 'Austin';

SELECT CONCAT('Customer Name: ', customer_name, ', Address: ', address, ', City: ', city, ', State: ', state, ', Zip Code: ', zip_code) AS customer_info FROM customers WHERE state = 'CA' OR state = 'NY';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_contact FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, customer_contact FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_contact FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address, customer_contact FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, o.order_total FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_total > 1000 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT od.product_id, p.product_name, od.quantity, od.price FROM OrderDetails od JOIN Products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, address FROM Customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, od.product_id, od.quantity FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.order_id = od.order_id WHERE od.quantity > 1 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING total_orders >= 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, SUM(od.quantity * od.price) AS total_spent FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id INNER JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.order_id = od.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
SELECT orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(products.unit_price * order_items.quantity) AS total_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_id, address_line1, city, state FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, order_items.quantity FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id;
SELECT customers.name, customers.address, addresses.city, addresses.state FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;

SELECT products.product_name, SUM(order_items.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
